Name: Rimebeard
About the game: Rimebeard is a grid-based puzzlegame where you create , remove and push blocks of ice strategically to extinguish all flames in each level. Navigate through the level methodically and use various other elements such as rocks, crates, pipes and more to achieve your goal and avoid getting stuck between a flame and a hard place. 70 levels are waiting to be solved in this game based on a NES classic.
